title: I Can't Log In
body: I can log into the website but when I try to log in to the game I get an incorrect password error. This has never happened before. I even reset it and the new one will not log me into the client. Any advice?? Thx.

replies.body: It sucks that you were disconnected in the middle of a match, and even more so that you ran into a weird login issue that kept you from getting back into the game. I can't do much about that game that was left, since those other teammates were still forced to play a game without a full team, but we should definitely try to prevent those d/c's from happening in the future. Before we dive too deep, let's be sure to check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something there is a little off. Test it in a custom game, and let me know how it helps!
I can log back in but now I have a penalty for AFK when I didn't decide to DC in the first place. Frust...
